uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform

Class VMwareAbstractHypervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform.Platform
      • uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform.VMwareAbstractHypervisor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VMwareWorkstation

    public abstract class VMwareAbstractHypervisor
extends Platform
    Implementation of platform abstract class to give support for VMware hypervisor.
